page.title: 08TRANSPORT _IN NORTHLEACH
page.content: Northleach has never had a railway line, although years ago there was a line to Bourton. The nearest railway stations are Cheltenham and Kingham. Four bus companies run regular services in the area_Perrets, National Pulhams and Marchants. There is a reasonable service to Cheltenham and Oxford and a limited service to Cirencester and Bourton. There is 1 bus to Hampnet on a Wednesday. The number of buses passing through Northleach on any 1 day is as follows:_ Monday _30; Tuesday _30; Wednesday _19; Thursday _41; Friday _52; Saturday _28; Saturday _28; Sunday _23! There is 1 taxi service. According to the children who walked them, the public footpaths are awful! Many people who live in Northleach drive to work in Chelt., Oxford, Glos. etc.
